name: Indicus Software
tag_list: middleware, software-products, custom-solutions, factory-automation, process-control, open-source-consultancy, web-applications, business-applications
overview:
Quick Facts:

Established: 1997

Office Locations: Pune (India) & Tokyo (Japan)

Solution Type: Software Development, Consulting, ODC and other IT Services

Ratings/Certifications: Appraised at Level 3 of Software Engineering Institute’s Capability Maturity Model (Software) - SEI-CMMI

Products: CONTINEO, CERIUM, VEROXA, PROJECTION, INDRIS

Partnerships & Associations: NEC Soft (Japan), Mobile Solution (Japan), Prescient Technologies (India)

Indicus Software is a software products and custom solutions development company with its primary development center in Pune, India. Indicus Software has been appraised at Level 3 of the Capability Maturity Model (software) by an SEI authorized lead appraiser. For more than 13 years, we have been providing value-added IT services to small, medium and large scale clients in Japan and other countries. Along with the development of custom solutions, our extensive research in various emerging technologies such as RFID, Code Generation, etc. have empowered us to build a portfolio of products catering to a very wide range of users. Our work ethics are guided by our extensive experience in international business and our methodologies are backed by our customer-centric quality policy which is to deliver quality solutions and services driven by effective processes, path-breaking technology, a team that strives for excellence and the continuous effort to maximize customer benefits.

At Indicus Software, it’s not all about the numbers… it’s more about the spirit that drives our organization forward. Right from the day we started, our business has been inspired by the desire to do a lot more than just provide outsourcing services to our customers. It has been our continuous endeavour to build long-lasting relationships, both with our clients and with each and every individual who is or has been part of our team.
